SEARCH
Package com.icx.domain.sql.tools

Class Java2Sql

java.lang.Object
com.icx.common.Common
com.icx.jdbc.SqlDbHelpers
com.icx.domain.sql.tools.Java2Sql
public abstract class Java2Sql extends com.icx.jdbc.SqlDbHelpers
Java program to generate SQL scripts for persistence database.

Java2Sql builds SQL scripts for generation of persistence database using 'domain' class definitions in Java source code. Currently database generation scripts for Oracle, MS SQL Server and MySQL are generated.

See com.icx.domain.sql.tools for details of Domain persistence mechanism.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      Entry point for 'Java2Sql' tool.

      Info and potential error logs will be written.

      See Java2Sql.

      Parameters:
      args - not needed
      Throws:
      Exception - on any error occurred during SQL script generation
